metaDescription.content: Original research and studies are the best way to gain insights into the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing. Here are data-driven reports, surveys, and case studies to help you optimize your online presence.

content.html:
Original Research & Studies

Stay on top of the SEO industry with original research and studies. Here are the latest data-backed resources.

Original Research & Studies

10 min read
96 Content Marketing Statistics You Need to Know for 2024Ready to enhance your 2024 content strategy? Check out these 96 content marketing statistics for inspiration. Based on Semrush research and data.
Margarita LoktionovaApr 10, 2024

Original Research & Studies

7 min read
10 Small Business Trends for 2024Learn the top small business trends for 2024 to stay ahead of the competition and keep employees happy.
Ankit VoraFeb 19, 2024

Original Research & Studies

14 min read
SEO Mistakes: Common SEO Issues & How to Fix ThemSEO issues can damage your Google rankings. Learn how to avoid and fix the most common SEO mistakes.
Kari DearieJan 24, 2024

Original Research & Studies

1 min read
Ranking Factors [Semrush Study]We analyzed a sample of 16,298 English keywords, all of which have more than 100 monthly searches. For each keyword, we collected the search engine results pages (SERPs) and analyzed the top 20 positions and their performance across a number of factors, ending up with a total of 300,000 positions.
Marcus ToberJan 04, 2024

Original Research & Studies

5 min read

Collaborative SEO: How Annalect Uses Semrush to Elevate Their Team’s Effectiveness

At Annalect Spain, the SEO team uses Semrush to build strategies, share data, and collaborate on client projects. Read on to learn how.
Semrush TeamDec 12, 2023

Original Research & Studies

4 min read

Average CPM for Display Ads: Benchmarks by Industry [Study]

If you‘re looking for CPM benchmarks for digital ads in your industry, this study is for you.
Luke HarselOct 23, 2023

Original Research & Studies

6 min read

Advertising Trends: The Most Popular Types of Digital Ads [Study]

By partnering with AdClarity, we’ve investigated ad types, ad channels and ad spend so you can plan and strategize with the kind of competitive edge that other players don’t have in your industry.
Luke HarselOct 10, 2023

Original Research & Studies

7 min read

The Unique Rank Volatility Patterns of the August 2023 Core Update

On August 22, 2023, Google announced the release of its August 2023 core update. The rank volatility trends surrounding the update were unprecedented, which makes diving into this update particularly interesting.
Mordy ObersteinSep 15, 2023

Original Research & Studies

2 min read

Revamp Product Listings for SERPs with These Ecommerce Insights

Expand your ecommerce business to Google SERP features to help increase revenue. Learn about each product-oriented Google SERP feature and how they perform on desktop and mobile. Read our study to learn more.
Erika VarangouliSep 14, 2023

Original Research & Studies

2 min read

Sharpen Your Ecommerce Business with Amazon Funnel Insights

Win on Amazon with actionable insights into the Amazon customer funnel. Learn how your customers browse, make purchase decisions, and when they‘re most likely to convert. Read the study to learn more.
Shannon O‘SheaAug 08, 2023
